body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer and wagon maker. Hanover, Germany native. Married to Harriet Otten. Father of Leslie Otten, Alice Otten, Margaret Otten, Louisa Otten, and Henry Otten. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860 and 1863.
